author: AETerry
title: Duplos
review:
Somehow I can still remember this set from over 20 years ago as a child. I remember playing with it. But I also remember that I soon lost all the pieces and figures.

 

Now-a-days, there's still Duplo and they're good sets to get a child to play with.

 

The set has left an impression of learning to build and use my imagination. Easy to use and it was fun.

 

The down side was not having a tub to put them in so that pieces were kept together.
